articles.title: Pacers Sports & Entertainment unveils plans to build world-class, $78M Indiana Fever Sports Performance Center - Indiana Fever

articles.author: Helen Regan
articles.title: India achieves first space docking, becoming fourth country to achieve major milestone - CNN
articles.description: India on Thursday became the fourth country to successfully achieve an unmanned docking in space, a feat seen as pivotal for future missions as New Delhi cements its place as a global space power.
